summary: This is a brief email chain regarding the scheduling of a discussion about the OPR's final report in the Jeffrey Epstein matter. It indicates the final report was transmitted in November 2020 and a follow-up conversation was being arranged in January 2021.

events.title: OPR Final Report Transmittal
events.description: The Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) transmitted its final report in the Jeffrey Epstein matter.

events.title: Scheduling Discussion on OPR Report
events.description: Email correspondence arranging a phone call to discuss the OPR's final report on the Jeffrey Epstein matter.

keyFacts: The Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) completed a final report on the Jeffrey Epstein matter, transmitted on November 12, 2020.
In January 2021, parties were arranging a follow-up discussion about this OPR final report.
The document is an email chain focused on scheduling a call, not containing substantive details of the report's findings.
